title: Duck Duck Clicker
description: Duck Duck Clicker is the ultimate duck-themed clicker game for anyone who just can't stop clicking cute things! Satisfy your irresistible urge to click endlessly on ridiculously adorable ducks. Rack up points, unlock fun customizations, and turn your duck into the most fabulous feathered friend in the galaxy. It's simple, it's silly, and it's dangerously addictive.
